title: Question:
author: coinremitter
content: Join the BTC discussion and let us know where you think it's headed! Will it skyrocket past 35K ðŸš€ or experience a dip ðŸ“‰? Your insights matter, so cast your vote and share your crypto wisdom with the community! ðŸ“Š

comments.author: Mr.suevie
comments.body: Quote from: coinremitter on October 24, 2023, 09:35:09 AMJoin the BTC discussion and let us know where you think it's headed! Will it skyrocket past 35K ðŸš€ or experience a dip ðŸ“‰? Your insights matter, so cast your vote and share your crypto wisdom with the community! ðŸ“ŠFirstly, this is the right board to post this. The speculation board is where this topic belongs, so l would advice you move the thread there mate. Well, as the movement of the price, I think 35k is just a matter of days because this short bull trend is soaring really fast and I believe if it continues, then 35k will just be something of past discussion.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: Even though there will still be an increase in the Bitcoin price, we must be wary of a decline, especially since the Bitcoin price has managed to increase to $34k. And if we look at the movement today, there may be a correction after the increase.And if the situation remains good, Bitcoin prices can continue to increase but we are still determining how long this will continue. Hopefully, there will be positive news that will be released so that it can support Bitcoin's movement.We should keep an eye on price movements. Those who trade, especially future trading, have clearly made big profits. Congratulations to them

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.created_time: October 24, 2023, 10:40:24 AMLast edit: October 24, 2023, 11:20:34 AM by Majestic-milf
comments.body: It can happen. Who would have thought that in the space of two days, it's price can move from $28k to $34,299.83 as at time of writing? We don't know the factors behind the sharp increase in Bitcoin price, but I'm all for it continuing to go up. We shouldn't be carried away by the rapid flight and forget that it can go down sharply because when I checked earlier today, the price was teasing $34k but then decreased, only to rise up back to $34k . Maybe at the end of today, prices will either go up or decrease towards $33k. Â The remaining months of this year may see the price of Bitcoin rising up as experts believe that at least one Bitcoin spot ETF could meet approval by the SEC. Although it's still a "maybe", who knows, this sudden jump in price could force investors and big whales to buy.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: coinremitter on October 24, 2023, 09:35:09 AMJoin the BTC discussion and let us know where you think it's headed! Will it skyrocket past 35K ðŸš€ or experience a dip ðŸ“‰? Your insights matter, so cast your vote and share your crypto wisdom with the community! ðŸ“ŠI can not say the price will go beyond $35000 or go down back to a price below. The outcome will depend on if the spot bitcoin ETF is approved or not. If not approved, I am expecting the market to calm and if calm for long the price will fall back. But if spot bitcoin ETF is approved, the price will increase above $35000.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Quote from: coinremitter on October 24, 2023, 09:35:09 AMJoin the BTC discussion and let us know where you think it's headed! Will it skyrocket past 35K ðŸš€ or experience a dip ðŸ“‰? Your insights matter, so cast your vote and share your crypto wisdom with the community! ðŸ“ŠThis sudden price hike was really unexpected. If this pace is followed then definitely there is huge chances that Bitcoins will cross the 35k usd mark. Why I am so confident about this? This is because as the price goes up, more people will panic and start buying the coin. This will increase the demand to accumulate the coin and in order to maintain the demand the price will go up. So definitely before October ends, we will see something really big.

comments.author: danadc
comments.body: Quote from: Mr.suevie on October 24, 2023, 09:37:10 AMQuote from: coinremitter on October 24, 2023, 09:35:09 AMJoin the BTC discussion and let us know where you think it's headed! Will it skyrocket past 35K ðŸš€ or experience a dip ðŸ“‰? Your insights matter, so cast your vote and share your crypto wisdom with the community! ðŸ“ŠFirstly, this is the right board to post this. The speculation board is where this topic belongs, so l would advice you move the thread there mate. Well, as the movement of the price, I think 35k is just a matter of days because this short bull trend is soaring really fast and I believe if it continues, then 35k will just be something of past discussion.The level of $35k is not something that is impossible, I have on my radar that it can reach $40k and that is what I have predefined so that it can be there, the fact that it has risen so much, in a short time is because we want to do it knowing that things can be very significant that the whales want this to happen now, I remember when I entered this world that things happened like this, since October the price began to rise and for me things are better when they happen in that direction Because I'm not wrong, when bitcoin started to rise I said that the range was going to be between $32k and $35k, it could be that this happens in December and it goes up to $40k and then maybe that's better.

Well, as the movement of the price, I think 35k is just a matter of days because this short bull trend is soaring really fast and I believe if it continues, then 35k will just be something of past discussion.The level of $35k is not something that is impossible, I have on my radar that it can reach $40k and that is what I have predefined so that it can be there, the fact that it has risen so much, in a short time is because we want to do it knowing that things can be very significant that the whales want this to happen now, I remember when I entered this world that things happened like this, since October the price began to rise and for me things are better when they happen in that direction Because I'm not wrong, when bitcoin started to rise I said that the range was going to be between $32k and $35k, it could be that this happens in December and it goes up to $40k and then maybe that's better.very possible as we are only about 1k from it. so this target can be achieved in few hours, days or so. if more positive sentiments will spread in the market, we can easily reach such level. so those who are planning to accumulate should think fast as of now. act before it is already high and then regret.

comments.author: Dave1
comments.body: Quote from: coinremitter on October 24, 2023, 09:35:09 AMJoin the BTC discussion and let us know where you think it's headed! Will it skyrocket past 35K ðŸš€ or experience a dip ðŸ“‰? Your insights matter, so cast your vote and share your crypto wisdom with the community! ðŸ“ŠIf I'm not mistaken, we have hit $35k already, but it slowly goes down to $33k. So it means that $35k is the next big barrier that we have to break. And I think we will retest that price again, if there is really some positive news around not like the Cointelegraph fake news or the ticker being displayed and then suddenly removed again.As per CMC:QuoteHigh$35,150.43People think its some kind of manipulation from big entities and wanted to see what will be the reaction of investors. And true enough, the bite on that hype pushing the price to $35k. But it has settled down a bit for now. But we are in a good position this October-December to at least be in the $40k-$50k region.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: The next move? Probably down to be honest as profit taking takes hold. However, we are most definitely going to soar above $35,000 in the future and likely the very near future. I think the odds are better than not that weâ€™ll see Bitcoin end the year in the $40,000 range and this recent price action only makes me feel better about that thought.

comments.author: bbc.reporter
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on October 24, 2023, 12:26:22 PMQuote from: coinremitter on October 24, 2023, 09:35:09 AMJoin the BTC discussion and let us know where you think it's headed! Will it skyrocket past 35K ðŸš€ or experience a dip ðŸ“‰? Your insights matter, so cast your vote and share your crypto wisdom with the community! ðŸ“ŠI can not say the price will go beyond $35000 or go down back to a price below. The outcome will depend on if the spot bitcoin ETF is approved or not. If not approved, I am expecting the market to calm and if calm for long the price will fall back. But if spot bitcoin ETF is approved, the price will increase above $35000.The next approval is on November 21. This is 3 weeks from the present date. Bitcoin is pumping because everyone is speculating that an ETF approval is a certainty. If the strength of this pump continues until November 21, where do you reckon bitcoin will go? I am quite certain it will be to $40k once another pump causes another short squeeze again.However, on November 21 we cannot predict how much bearish overreaction this market might create if the SEC announces a rejection. Similar to how short squeezes make pumps stronger, liquidating long buyers also make the dump also stronger.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Neither, I think. We had so much hype and so much increase in a short period of time that I think we'll just calm down a bit and go sideways around the $33k to $35k price range. I don't think there's be much sellers due to the anticipation of both the ETF and the halving.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Join the vote at the last minute hahaha. The news lately can't be trusted Cointelegraph said that BlackRock has been approved by the SEC and the price spike touched 30K level after that it turned it is fake news and bitoin price go down again. Watcher guru said that the ETF is on listing but it turned out that the list already there from the august. What a joke. The conclusion is if the bitcoin manage stay 30K level wich is a crucial point the price can go beyond the 35K

comments.author: YUriy1991
comments.body: Bitcoin is wanting, Bitcoin is winning as we can see from the graph on your phone or computer Dashboard, BTC has experienced a fantastic rise in the near future, against all odds.There are a lot of unknowns coming But, Once the hype slows down, we will definitely see some kind of correction but it might just be a moment and not last long (a while) and BTC is ready to fly above beyond 35K again and that's not a hallucination.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on October 25, 2023, 01:06:17 AMThe next move? Probably down to be honest as profit taking takes hold. However, we are most definitely going to soar above $35,000 in the future and likely the very near future. I think the odds are better than not that weâ€™ll see Bitcoin end the year in the $40,000 range and this recent price action only makes me feel better about that thought. 42-48 sometime in December. I kind of think it will be in this area. I kind of am basing this on the Dec 2015 prices.We went from 380 to 770 from sept 2015 to dec 2015.a mining relief rally.Â  I think we are seeing this now.

comments.author: Latviand
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on October 25, 2023, 01:06:17 AMThe next move? Probably down to be honest as profit taking takes hold. However, we are most definitely going to soar above $35,000 in the future and likely the very near future. I think the odds are better than not that weâ€™ll see Bitcoin end the year in the $40,000 range and this recent price action only makes me feel better about that thought. Does this factor in the result of the approval of bitcoin ETF? Some of the post are saying that if it's approved then it's going to improve the market prices but if not then there's a possibility that the price will either calm down or go down. @mk4 said that we've gone up too high too fast and I can agree with that too because this all happened before, price going up fast and people getting in the hype only to have their hopes up pulled under them giving them losses.

comments.author: Xcode7
comments.body: Quote from: YUriy1991 on October 25, 2023, 03:50:27 AMBitcoin is wanting, Bitcoin is winning as we can see from the graph on your phone or computer Dashboard, BTC has experienced a fantastic rise in the near future, against all odds.There are a lot of unknowns coming But, Once the hype slows down, we will definitely see some kind of correction but it might just be a moment and not last long (a while) and BTC is ready to fly above beyond 35K again and that's not a hallucination.That has happened, and we have seen a price of 35k, although only for a moment and now the movement of Bitcoin is starting to stop from its significant increase, now the price movement tends to be stable and what will happen in the future is still a mystery, but I think although there will still be a correction, it will be slow but big chances are we will fly again and exceed 35k.Quote from: philipma1957 on October 25, 2023, 03:54:43 AM42-48 sometime in December. I kind of think it will be in this area. I kind of am basing this on the Dec 2015 prices.We went from 380 to 770 from sept 2015 to dec 2015.a mining relief rally.Â  I think we are seeing this now.It is possible and I believe that what happened in the past will be repeated, if we look at previous years then at the end of the year there were many positive movements that occurred, although I don't predict it with certainty but I think prices above 40k are very possible.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: Itâ€™s depends what happens to this etf news. Almost everyday there is some bull or bearish news. The way itâ€™s going it seems it will get approved in a couple of weeks. So we will slowly grind upwards and then when we get the good news we might have another $5000 day in the $40-45K area.What happens after that is anyones guess. When the bitcoin futures went live, we topped. When coinbase went live we topped for 6 months, and when bitcoin futures etf went live we topped at $69K. Will history repeat this time?
